Name: Ultimate Solid
About the game: Ultimate Solid is a physics-based game in platform world full of challenging obstacles and fun puzzle elements. Unlike the traditional platform games movement is limited to jumping only! By adjusting the strength and angle of each jump, the goal is to not collide with any hostile elements on the way to the finish line. Or rather, a vortex that sucks you all the way in to the next level. Sounds easy? Well, try it, you will be surprised ;). Oh! And by the wayâ€¦ you also have to collect powerups on your way to the end of the level. Collect them all and you will activate the endpoint and be allowed entry to the next level. Powerups are strategically placed throughout the level to challenge your skills! Unique player controls Physics-based interactions with the game world 200 unique levels Variety of obstacles including spikes, saws, hammers and blades Use strategy and the laws of gravity to outsmart clever obstacles in this action-packed arcade platform puzzle game!
